articles.title: US Inflation Eases, Fueling Bets on Fed Rate Cut
articles.summary: Headline CPI slowed to 3.1% y/y in August, below expectations. Traders raised odds of a 25bp Fed cut at the next FOMC.

articles.title: Apple Plans Major Buyback as Cash Pile Hits Record
articles.summary: Apple Inc. announced a $90B share repurchase, citing strong free cash flow and resilient iPhone demand.

articles.title: High-Yield Spreads Widen Amid Risk-Off Mood
articles.summary: HY bond spreads jumped 50bps over IG as investors rotated into safer assets following global growth fears.
